Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2014 12:11AM coprose wrote: I had chemo and radiation in 2007 and I have had continous dental problems since then.  I have lost two teeth after root canals and I have had a third root canal and I believe that tooth is now cracked.  I have a fourth tooth that is starting to hurt.  Is there anything that will help slow down the decay and cracking?  I have read to use fluoride treatments every day?  My dentist is a breast cancer survivor and she has no problems with her teeth and she thinks I am crazy.  Help. Any suggestions will be appreciated.
Posts.Title: post chemo dental problems sunflower45 Moderators
